properties.entry: SELECT CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRICE, COUNT, FUND_PRICE, PRODUCT_NO FROM IMAGE JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 20
SELECT CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRICE, COUNT, FUND_PRICE, PRODUCT_NO FROM IMAGE JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1
SELECT CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRICE, COUNT, FUND_PRICE, PRODUCT_NO FROM IMAGE JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND FUNDING_YN = 'N'
SELECT CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRICE, COUNT, FUND_PRICE, PRODUCT_NO FROM IMAGE JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND FUNDING_YN = 'Y'
SELECT PRODUCT_TITLE, PRICE, COUNT, FUND_PRICE, PRODUCT_NO FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO IN (48,44,46,45,47,43) ORDER BY COUNT
SELECT CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH,PRODUCT_TITLE,PRODUCT_NO,CATEGORY_NO FROM IMAGE JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND PRODUCT_TITLE LIKE ? ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC
